attributes.action: Education is a right, not just a privilege for the privileged
attributes.additional_details: Mandela once said that "Education is the most powerful weapon which we can use to change the world", I completely agree. I believe that education is a right and further education shouldn't have fees as it creates a class divide and penalises the underprivileged. I want further education to be free allowing everyone an equal chance at education no matter what their class.
